attributes.action: Move petition.parliment.uk to a more scaleable system to ensure it doesn't crash
attributes.background: Critical petitions create serious demand from the population and when the site goes down people are not able to record their signature. This means people are missing an opportunity to demonstrate their right to democracy.

rejection.details:
We have significantly increased the processing capacity of the UK Government and Parliament petitions system since the unprecedented demand in late March.

We're not sure what further action you would like us to take.
